document.full_text: portugal's caretaker prime minister jose socrates criticized the main opposition party on sunday, showing pre-election jostling may complicate a tough new phase of bailout talks that start on monday.
document.title: portugal prime minister slams opposition
lines_and_colors: portugal's caretaker prime minister jose socrates criticized the main opposition party on sunday, showing pre-election jostling may complicate a tough new phase of bailout talks that start on monday.
